Question.Subject: What should I name a blog?
Question.Content:
I want to document all the odd, crazy, funny, unique situations and dealings I've had with customers and people in general. I'll keep it all confidential, but just want to share stories with my family and friends.
For example, I had a customer today ask if we could refund her estate if she died before we were able to provide her with what she had just paid for.
And the other day, I had an older gentleman walk in at work and say "Well Hello, there, Woody!".
I want the blog name to be fun and humorous, but catchy.
Question.ChosenAnswer: Use http://domai.nr makewords.com etc to find interesting and crazy domain names....

Answer.Content:
Odd Work Days / Odd Work Moments (?) OWD / OWM
Something catchy depends on your opinion.
Use http://domai.nr makewords.com etc to find interesting and crazy domain names....
Answer.Reference: Website/blog(http://www.levoltz.com) owner since March 2007; have tried almost every method of website revenue generation available; still need to improve a few things and get more sites out there but I'm about halfway to earning a full time income solely online
